name: Discount Displays
tag_list: advertising, print, displays, marketing, retail, b2b, exhibitions, trade-shows, promotions
overview:
UK based experts in exhibition equipment, point of sales promotional displays and large format print.

Backed by over 30 years experience, the team at Discount Displays is on hand to advise on the best equipment to suit your upcoming promotion and work within your marketing budget.

Wide range of display equipment including banner stands, pop up stands, pole and panel displays, literature racks and much more. In-house design and print studio producing high quality posters, banners, stickers and signs. Using the latest print technology and media to ensure market leading results.
